item.title: Windows
item.description: Windows NET NET Command is used to manage network resources. runas run programs as other users.

item.title: Unix
item.description: Unix apt A commandline package manager and provides commands for searching and managing as well as querying information about packages. awk awk is a complete pattern scanning and processing language, it is most commonly used as a Unix command-line filter to reformat the output of other commands. base64 base64 encode/decode data and print to standard output. bzip2
